channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-18370] standalone-metastore gen dir contains two annotation/package-info.java which causes IDEA build fail
item.description:
HIVE-17933 moved the generated sources to gen/version directory
HIVE-17907 committed the src/gen/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/annotation/package-info.java file

Because of this IDEA can not compile the standalone-metastore module.
It fails with this stack trace:

Information:java: An exception has occurred in the compiler (1.8.0_152). Please file a bug against the Java compiler via the Java bug reporting page (http://bugreport.java.com) after checking the Bug Database (http://bugs.java.com) for duplicates. Include your program and the following diagnostic in your report. Thank you.

Information:java: 	at org.jetbrains.jps.incremental.java.JavaBuilder.compileJava(JavaBuilder.java:481)
Information:java: 	at org.jetbrains.jps.incremental.java.JavaBuilder.compile(JavaBuilder.java:331)

Information:java: 	at org.jetbrains.jps.incremental.IncProjectBuilder.build(IncProjectBuilder.java:178)

Warning:Output path /Users/petervary/dev/upstream/hive/standalone-metastore/target/generated-sources/annotations intersects with a source root. Only files that were created by build will be cleaned.
item.summary: standalone-metastore gen dir contains two annotation/package-info.java which causes IDEA build fail

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
kgyrtkirk, sershe: Could you please review?

Thanks,
Peter
